ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 85
ygData.msgSnippet: Just want to warn you about doing theese stunts. You can do the same thing to the spectres in ferrott. Get em stuck and cast through the wall. But I know two
ygData.messageBody:
Just want to warn you about doing theese stunts. You can do the same thing to the spectres in ferrott. Get em stuck and cast through the wall. But I know two people in my guild that have been warned by GM's not to exploit this bug or they will take action. Anyway, you run in to the cave with the spectre/spectres after you and just before the room with the entrance to plane of fear the spectres will get stuck in the wall and you can cast through it.

(Agrees fully with you. Don't wanna read about babys trying to sue each other either)

>
> At the Entrance to Nanjena you can pull a Rock Dervish. If you get a good
> lead and run around the corner almost zoning into nanjena you can still cast
> at the Dervish. The mob for some reason climbs the side of the zone and
> never goes into the tunnel to Nanjena. You can then kill the mob without
> getting hit yourself.
>
> The same thing with cyclops in Mt Rathe. You can pull them. Just to the
> North of the entrance from Lk Rathe is a mountain range. If you root or
> snare the cy to slow his movement you can run around the mountain range and
> cast on him from the other side. The cyclops tries to get to you but
> instead goes way up into the air and never touches you. Flying Cy is pretty
> funny too.
>
> Anybody else found spots like these?
